survival-needs-pf2e.settings.updateInter: Needs will increase for all enabled trackers after this many game hours have passed. Default: 4 hours.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.affectsNPCs: If checked, non-player characters (type 'npc') will also have their needs tracked. Default: false.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.trackerConf: Open a UI to add, remove, and edit survival trackers and their associated effects.
survival-needs-pf2e.sheet.title: Survival Needs
survival-needs-pf2e.sheet.noTrackersEnab: No survival trackers are currently enabled.
survival-needs-pf2e.notifications.noSuit: {actorName} has no suitable items to affect {trackerName}.
Select an item to use for {trackerName}:
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.trackerConf: Directly edit the JSON array for tracker configurations. Be careful: invalid JSON will cause issues. Refer to module documentation for the correct structure.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.invalidTrac: Survival Needs: The provided Tracker Configuration JSON is invalid and could not be parsed. Error: {error}. Reverting to defaults or last valid configuration if possible.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.errorLoadin: Survival Needs: Error loading tracker configurations. Using default settings. Please check console (F12) and module settings.
survival-needs-pf2e.dialogs.jsonConfigCh: The raw JSON for tracker configurations has been changed. Do you want to re-process all actor effects now? This might take a moment if you have many actors.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.dialogs.choiceTriggersLon: Triggers a full rest of 8 hours)
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.choices.drink.isPotion: Is a Potion? (Stress Up, Boredom Down)
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.dialogs.consumeDetails.pr: Regarding the {itemName} (Effective Bulk for this use: {itemBulk}):
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.itemEmptyAn: {itemName} is now empty and has been discarded.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.trackerDefi: Directly edit the JSON array defining each tracker's properties, thresholds, effects, and special actions.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.consumption: Directly edit the JSON object for global consumption calculation constants (e.g., standard bulk values, effect multipliers).
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.invalidCalc: Survival Needs: The Consumption Calculation Settings JSON is invalid. Error: {error}. Using defaults.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.errorLoadin: Survival Needs: Error loading Consumption Calculation Settings. Using defaults.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.populateDef: Populate JSON Fields with Module Defaults

Clicking this button will fill the 'Tracker Definitions (JSON)' and 'Consumption Calculation Settings (JSON)' text fields above with their original module-provided default values. You must then click 'Save Settings' at the bottom of this settings page to make these defaults active.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.resetConfig: Restores Tracker Definitions AND Consumption Calculation Settings to their module defaults. This action cannot be undone from the UI.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.dialogs.resetConfirm.text: Are you sure you want to restore all Survival Needs configurations (Tracker Definitions and Calculation Settings) to their module defaults?
Any custom JSON edits you've made to these settings will be lost.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.configsRese: Survival Needs: All configurations have been reset to their defaults.
Survival Needs: An error occurred while trying to reset configurations.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.dialogs.configsResetAndRe: Configurations have been reset to default. Do you want to re-process all actor effects now? This is recommended and might take a moment.
survival-needs-pf2e.settings.restoreDefa: Click here to populate fields with module defaults. You must then click 'Save Settings' at the bottom of the page to apply them.
SURVIVAL_NEEDS.notifications.defaultsPop: Survival Needs: Default configurations have been loaded into the fields. Review and click 'Save Settings' to apply.
Survival Needs: Could not find one or more configuration fields to populate.
Survival Needs: Error encountered while trying to populate default configurations.
